title: OpenAI invests in Sam Altmanâ€™s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs
contentSnippet: OpenAI is participating in a $250 million seed round into Merge Labs, Sam Altman's brain computer interface startup. The startup is valued at $850 million.
content: OpenAI is participating in a $250 million seed round into Merge Labs, Sam Altman's brain computer interface startup. The startup is valued at $850 million.
